parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From dokimos; to test; by implication, to approve.
A particle of succession, then, moreover.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From diakonos; to be an attendant, i.e. Wait upon (figuratively) teacher; technically, to act as a Christian deacon.
